headline: Down Home Chitterlings
name: Down Home Chitterlings
description: Chitterlings, made from pigs' intestines, are a favorite among Southern families. They are typically served with greens, vinegar, and hot sauce.
recipeIngredient: 10 pounds frozen chitterlings, thawed and cleaned

recipeInstructions.text: Place cleaned chitterlings in a 6-quart pot and cover with cold water.
Bring to a rolling boil; add onion and season with salt, garlic, and red pepper flakes.
Simmer until chitterlings are clear to white in color and reach desired tenderness, 3 to 4 hours.
